description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A History of the Town of Franklin, Mass.; from its settlement to the completion of its first century, 2d March, 1878; with genealogical notices of its earliest families, sketches of its professional men, and a report of the centennial celebration. By Mortimer Blake" Contributor: BLAKE, Mortimer. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10409.i.2." Page: 242 Place of Publishing: Franklin Date of Publishing: 1879 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001311432 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
